main.description: Customize file names for your exported ads
main.title: Success
main.subTitle: File Name Structure

scarcity.name: Scarcity
scarcity.description: Creating a sense of limited availability or urgency to encourage immediate action. Only 5 spots left! Grab yours now before they're gone!

socialProof.name: Social Proof
socialProof.description: Leveraging the influence of others to demonstrate that a product or service is popular or trustworthy. Join over 1 million satisfied customers who love our product!

authority.name: Authority
authority.description: Using endorsements or featuring experts to establish credibility and trustworthiness. As recommended by top dermatologists worldwide.

reciprocity.name: Reciprocity
reciprocity.description: Offering something of value upfront to encourage the viewer to reciprocate by taking a desired action. Get a free e-book when you sign up for our newsletter.

fearOfMissingOut.name: Fear of Missing Out (FOMO)
fearOfMissingOut.description: Highlighting the potential negative consequences of not taking advantage of an opportunity. Don't miss the biggest sale of the year! Limited time only!

emotionalAppeal.name: Emotional Appeal
emotionalAppeal.description: Evoking strong emotions to create a connection between the viewer and the product or service. Experience the joy and happiness of a carefree vacation.

personalization.name: Personalization
personalization.description: Tailoring the ad content to the individual's preferences, needs, or demographics. Hey [Name], we have an exclusive offer just for you!

bandwagonEffect.name: Bandwagon Effect
bandwagonEffect.description: Encouraging the viewer to join or align with a group or trend to feel a sense of belonging. Join the bitcoin revolution and learn about crypto trading with our community!

authorityBias.name: Authority Bias
authorityBias.description: Presenting information in a way that appears objective and backed by experts or data. 9 out of 10 dentists recommend our toothpaste for a brighter smile.

incentives.name: Incentives
incentives.description: Offering rewards or incentives to motivate the viewer to take a specific action. Refer a friend and get 20% off your next purchase!

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: This tone is formal, respectful, and authoritative. It's often used by B2B companies, financial institutions, and legal firms.

friendly.name: Friendly
friendly.description: This tone is casual, warm, and approachable. It's often used by consumer brands that want to build a close, personal relationship with their customers.

informative.name: Informative
informative.description: This tone is educational, clear, and thorough. It's often used by tech companies, educational institutions, and organizations that aim to provide valuable information to their audience.

inspirational.name: Inspirational
inspirational.description: This tone is uplifting, empowering, and visionary. It's often used by non-profit organizations, motivational brands, and companies that aim to inspire their audience.

playful.name: Playful
playful.description: This tone is humorous, quirky, and fun. It's often used by lifestyle brands, children's brands, and companies that want to entertain their audience.

passionate.name: Passionate
passionate.description: This tone is energetic, enthusiastic, and emotional. It's often used by activist brands, sports brands, and companies that want to ignite passion in their audience.

sophisticated.name: Sophisticated
sophisticated.description: This tone is refined, elegant, and intelligent. It's often used by luxury brands, art institutions, and companies that want to communicate a sense of exclusivity.

rebellious.name: Rebellious
rebellious.description: This tone is defiant, bold, and disruptive. It's often used by innovative startups, punk brands, and companies that want to challenge the status quo.

trustworthy.name: Trustworthy
trustworthy.description: This tone is reliable, honest, and sincere. It's often used by healthcare organizations, news outlets, and companies that want to build trust with their audience.

metaCarousel.name: Meta Carousel
metaCarousel.description: FB Feed, FB Video Feeds, FB Business Explore, IG Explore, Audience Network Rewarded Video, Messenger Stories, FB Groups Feed, IG Shops

metaImage.name: Meta Image
metaImage.description: FB Feed, FB Business Explore, FB Video Feeds, Audience Network Rewarded Video

metaVideo.name: Meta Video
metaVideo.description: FB Feed, FB Business Explore, FB Right Column, FB Groups Feed, IG Shop

descriptive.name: Descriptive
descriptive.description: This style aims to paint a picture and immerse the reader in the experience. It's characterized by detailed descriptions, vivid imagery, and sensory language.

expository.name: Expository
expository.description: This style is used to explain, describe, or inform. It's straightforward and fact-based, often featuring logical organization and clear, concise language.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.description: This style tells a story with a clear sequence of events. It often includes elements like characters, setting, conflict, and resolution, and is frequently used in novels, short stories, and narrative essays.

persuasive.name: Persuasive
persuasive.description: This style aims to convince the reader of a particular viewpoint. It employs techniques such as appeals to emotion, logical arguments, and credible evidence to persuade the reader.

argumentative.name: Argumentative
argumentative.description: This is similar to persuasive writing but often takes a more formal approach, rigorously presenting and refuting different points of view to build a strong argument.

technical.name: Technical
technical.description: This style is used to explain complex topics or processes in a clear, straightforward manner. It's common in user manuals, scientific papers, and how-to guides.

business.name: Business
business.description: This style prioritizes clarity, conciseness, and professionalism. It's used in memos, reports, proposals, and other business-related communications.

journalistic.name: Journalistic
journalistic.description: This style involves reporting facts accurately and objectively. It often uses the inverted pyramid structure, where the most important information is presented first.

academic.name: Academic
academic.description: This style is formal and structured, used in scholarly articles, textbooks, and theses. It typically involves presenting an argument or findings based on rigorous research and evidence.

creative.name: Creative
creative.description: This is a broad style category that allows for more personal expression and originality. It's often used in fiction, poetry, and personal essays, but can also be applied to certain types of advertising or content marketing.

conversational.name: Conversational
conversational.description: This style mimics spoken language and is often more informal and engaging. It's commonly used in blog posts, social media, and some types of advertising or content marketing.

actions.dragAndDropOrBrowse: Drag And Drop Your Files Here or Browse

main.title: Sorry, the page you're trying to access is unavailable.
Sorry, you do not have access to this brand.

actions.configure: Configure your user and account settings.

export.notificationText: You will receive an email with the report soon.

validationErrors.noChannels: Please select at least one channel.
validationErrors.noReportLevels: Please select at least one report level.
validationErrors.noReportTimeBreakdowns: Please select at least one report time breakdown.
validationErrors.noWeekStartDay: Please select a week start day.

metricsSelection.title: Metrics Selection
metricsSelection.description: Customize your tracked metrics and their display order here. Toggle to include or exclude metrics and drag and drop to reorder them. Hover over each metric to view its description.
metricsSelection.disclaimer: Note: Changes made here will only affect your current user.

dimensionsSelection.title: Dimensions Selection
dimensionsSelection.description: Customize your tracked dimensions and their display order here. Toggle to include or exclude dimensions and drag and drop to reorder them. Hover over each dimension to view its description.
dimensionsSelection.disclaimer: Note: Changes made here will only affect your current user.

confidenceThreshold.title: Confidence Threshold
confidenceThreshold.description: Some metrics, such as CTR or CPC, need many impressions to be accurate. The slider lets you control how many impressions are considered ‘enough’ for confident results based on the width of the 95% confidence interval. Values with low confidence can then be filtered to avoid showing misleading information, or they can be shown but marked with an asterisk (*).
confidenceThreshold.disclaimer: Note: Changes made here will only affect your current user.
confidenceThreshold.instructions: Adjust the confidence threshold by defining how many impressions are considered 'enough'. Moving the slider to the left will tolerate lower confidence values, while moving it to the right will set a higher confidence threshold.

conversionConfiguration.title: Conversion Configuration
conversionConfiguration.description: Conversion configuration allows you to set your 'Conversion' goal for each platform. This will allow you to display data across channels for similar or the same goals.
conversionConfiguration.disclaimer: Note: Changes made here will affect ALL USERS of this brand.

spend.tooltipLabel: Amount of money spent on the creative

impressions.tooltipLabel: Number of times the creative is shown

clicks.tooltipLabel: Number of clicks on the creative

thumbstop.tooltipLabel: Number of views on the video creative

thumbstopRate.tooltipLabel: Number of views on the video creative per impression

atcs.tooltipLabel: Number of Add To Cart actions

channel.tooltipLabel: The platform/website where the creative is shown

campaign.tooltipLabel: The marketing campaign to which the creative belongs

adGroup.tooltipLabel: The ad group to which the creative belongs

videoLength.tooltipLabel: The length of the video creative

body.tooltipLabel: The body text of the creative

persuasionTactic.tooltipLabel: The predominant persuasion tactic used in the creative

writingStyle.tooltipLabel: The predominant writing style used in the creative

toneOfVoice.tooltipLabel: The predominant tone of voice used in the creative

hookValue.tooltipLabel: The predominant hook used in the creative to grab the viewer's attention

gender.tooltipLabel: The gender of the persona displayed in the creative

offerInAd.tooltipLabel: The presence of an offer in the creative

backgroundColor.tooltipLabel: The predominant background color used in the creative

audioPresent.tooltipLabel: The presence of audio in the creative

personStatus.tooltipLabel: The point of view displayed in the creative

narratorGender.tooltipLabel: The gender of the narrator in the creative

confidenceThreshold.filtered: Some values are filtered due to low confidence.
confidenceThreshold.showLowConfidence: * indicates a value with low confidence. Hover for details.
confidenceThreshold.willBeFiltered: Values with low confidence will be filtered.
confidenceThreshold.willBeIncluded: Values with low confidence will be included, but marked with an asterisk (*).
confidenceThreshold.basedOnObserved: Based on the observed events, the true value of

general.inTheWorks: In the works, check back again later!

assets.preview_empty: Select an item to see details

url.title: Brand URL
url.description: The unique web address representing your brand online, serving as a digital gateway for customers to access your products, services, and information.
url.tooltip: The unique web address representing your brand online, serving as a digital gateway for customers to access your products, services, and information.

description.title: Brand Description
description.description: Provide a brief overview of your brand's core identity, mission, and target audience. Highlight key aspects that distinguish your brand and its high-level goals.
description.tooltip: We are a sustainable fashion brand focused on eco-friendly materials. Our mission is to promote ethical production while delivering stylish and comfortable clothing for environmentally conscious consumers.

brandValues.title: Brand Values
brandValues.description: Define your brand's principles and values. Describe how your brand speaks to its audience, ensuring consistency in tone and messaging.
brandValues.tooltip: Sustainability: We prioritise eco-friendly materials. Transparency: We ensure clear communication about sourcing and manufacturing practices. Inclusivity: Our brand speaks to a diverse and inclusive audience.

targetAudience.title: Targeted Audience
targetAudience.description: A specific group of consumers identified by demographics, interests, and behaviors to maximize marketing effectiveness.
targetAudience.tooltip: Our target audience is environmentally conscious consumers aged 25-40 who value sustainable fashion and ethical production practices.

adCopy.title: Ad Copy
adCopy.description: Outline guidelines for writing effective ad copy. Specify language that resonates with your audience and aligns with your brand's communication style.
adCopy.tooltip: Celebrate your unique style with our organic cotton tees. Be comfortable, be confident, and be you.

copyGenerationRestriction.title: Copy Generation Restrictions
copyGenerationRestriction.description: Specify phrases or topics that should not be used in your brand's ad copy to avoid messaging that could conflict with your brand values.
copyGenerationRestriction.tooltip: Avoid phrases such as 'cheap fashion' or 'disposable clothing.' Ensure that language reflects the brand's focus on quality and sustainability.

imageGuidline.title: Image Use and Generation Guidelines
imageGuidline.description: Detail the types of images that best represent your brand visually. Share examples that illustrate your brand’s preferred look and feel.
imageGuidline.placeholder: Enter Image Use and Generation Guidelines
imageGuidline.tooltip: Feature models in outdoor settings that reflect nature and sustainability. Include close-ups of our signature eco-friendly fabrics.

imageGenerationRestriction.title: Image Generation Restrictions
imageGenerationRestriction.description: Identify image types or visual elements that should be avoided to maintain alignment with your brand’s identity and values.
imageGenerationRestriction.tooltip: Avoid indoor studio shots with bright artificial lighting. Refrain from using props or settings that don't align with the eco-friendly theme.

productFeatures.title: Product Features and Benefits
productFeatures.description: A product features are the value that customers realise from a product or service. It refer to what the user gains from using it as well as how it's better than its competitors.
productFeatures.tooltip: Multiple Logins: Multiple contacts can login to ensure brand consistency and guidelines.

generateOverview.title: Generate Overview
generateOverview.brandBookPlaceholder: To ensure your results are always on brand and highly creative, we need some details about your brand. Use the brand's brand book as it's incredibly rich source of information and guidelines about your brand.
generateOverview.visualAssetsPlaceholder: Upload visual assets such as product images, logos, background images, and fonts to train your brand's LLM
generateOverview.loaderPlaceholder: We are currently retrieving data from the Brand Book to generate the Brand Overview.

onboarding.cardAuthFailed: Card Authentication failed. Please re-enter card info
onboarding.charge: You will not be charged for signing up
onboarding.checkInbox: Please check your inbox and click the link to sign-in
onboarding.createBriefGuide: AI-assisted creative briefs take project-specific details about your marketing objective, target audience(s) and writing style to generate project concepts. An active Creative Brief is required to power AI-generated copy and images.
onboarding.ensureResults: To ensure your results are always on-brand, we need some more details
onboarding.pleaseEnter: Please enter your credit or debit card details to proceed. This information is necessary for setting up your payment method and ensuring seamless transactions.
onboarding.readyToStart: Ready to start? Click here to set up and launch your campaign.
onboarding.selectCountry: Select country and we'll add your language and currency details
onboarding.selectTemplateGuide: Browse our template library or create a template by uploading a Photoshop file or building from scratch in the desired canvas dimensions. You will need to complete a Creative Brief later to power AI copy and image variations in the template 'Create Variations' feature.

transferOwnership.agreement: Transferring account ownership will restrict your ability to manage brand-level settings. Proceed with caution, as this action is irreversible

newPassword.label: New Password
newPassword.required: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special character and must be at least 10 characters long

saveModal.title: Placeholders Updated
saveModal.subTitle: What would you like to do with existing content?

generateAll.title: Re-generate
generateAll.description: Will overwrite all existing content across all placeholders.

noGenerate.title: Do nothing
noGenerate.description: Any existing content will remain as is. No new content will be generated for any newly added or edited placeholders.

design.title: Confirm Template Change
design.subTitle: You are about to switch from an Image template to a Video template. This change will alter the export format from PNG to MP4. Are you sure you want to proceed?

video.title: Confirm Template Change
video.subTitle: You are about to switch from a Video template to an Image template. This change will alter the export format from MP4 to PNG. Are you sure you want to proceed?
